overview: "As a reminder for the younger generations, in 1983 there were only 3 television channels in France. Special effects production with graphic palette was at its beginning in editing rooms. Canal+ was born in 1984, the 5th and 6th channels in 1986.  Marshall MacLuhan and Paul Virilio provided input for my reflections regarding the impact of technologies on our five senses and our spatio-temporal perception"
title: Petite Mort
